thread.title: The Yelpification of business software: Why online reviews have reached a tipping point

author: newsr.in
title: The Yelpification of business software: Why online reviews have reached a tipping point
text: SPONSORED: This sponsored post is produced by Capterra. For well over a decade, consumers have increasingly turned to online review sites to vet purchase decisions before they buy. Take a look at the top trafficked sites on the web, and it’s no shock to see consumer review sites by the likes of Amazon and Yelp both […] »
